short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically captures 2FA codes from Google Messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2F2Chrome is a Chrome extension designed to automatically capture two-factor authentication (2FA) codes from Google Messages for use within the Chrome web browser.
